problems.title: Struggling to keep your community project organized?
problems.subtitle: Decentralization brings its own challenges.
problems.misalignment: Without real transparency and accountability, it's hard for contributors to fully trust the process.
problems.findingAllies: People lose motivation when they don’t feel heard or fairly rewarded for what they bring.
problems.internalConflicts: Manually tracking contributions and workload is exhausting and often leads to conflict.
problems.authenticity: Without the right tools, it’s hard to turn decentralized ideals into real, visible shared control.

howItWorks.title: How AngoraSix works
howItWorks.subtitle: A simple process to make your community-driven project work

step1.title: Define the project rules
step1.description: We provide a simple framework to set how the project will be managed: decisions, payments, and tasks. Everything is clear and visible for everyone from the start.
step1.imageAlt: Initial setup screen for project rules

step2.title: Connect with your management tools
step2.description: We integrate with the tools you already use — Trello, Notion, Jira, Github Projects, and more — to automatically track what each member contributes.
step2.imageAlt: Integration view showing external tools and tracked contributions

outcome1.title: Shared decisions based on real contributions
outcome1.description: AngoraSix offers a governance system based on ownership. The more someone gives to the project, the more weight their vote has in key decisions. Fair, without hierarchies or conflict.
outcome1.imageAlt: Governance dashboard showing weighted voting based on contributions

outcome2.title: Automated, secure, and transparent income handling
outcome2.description: We connect your project to a multi-signature shared wallet to automatically distribute earnings based on contributions. Everyone receives what they deserve.
outcome2.imageAlt: Fund distribution screen showing automatic payments by contribution
